text: The Royal Forest and Bird Protection Society of New Zealand Inc. (Forest & Bird) is an environmental organisation. It specialises in conservation of indigenous plant and animal life in and around New Zealand. *The Society has over 45 active branches. They are located in urban and rural centres in New Zealand. *Branches are very engaged in conservation projects on a community and regional basis. *Society offices and staff are in Auckland, Christchurch and Wellington. *The society publishes a journal four times a year: Forest & Bird. == References == Category:Environmental organizations Category:Wellington Category:Conservation Category:Forestry Category:1923 establishments in Oceania Category:20th-century establishments in New Zealand Category:Organizations based in New Zealand
title: Royal Forest and Bird Protection Society of New Zealand
